contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox anthem |title = Aruba Dushi Tera |english_title = Aruba Sweet Land |image = Aruba flags.jpg |image_size = |border = |caption = |prefix = National |country = {{ABW}} |author = [[Padú del Caribe|Juan Chabaya Lampe]] |lyrics_date = |composer = Rufo Wever |music_date = |adopted = 1976 |until = |sound = Aruba Dushi Tera instrumental.ogg |sound_title = Aruba Dushi Tera (instrumental) }} '''Aruba Dushi Tera''' (Aruba Sweet Land) is the [[national anthem]] of [[Aruba]]. It is a waltz written by [[Padú del Caribe|Juan Chabaya Lampe]] and composed by Rufo Wever. It was accepted as the anthem on March 18, 1976. It is written in [[Papiamento]]. ==Papiamento lyrics== {{lang|pap|Aruba patria aprecia <br/> nos cuna venera<br/> Chikito y simpel bo por ta<br/> pero si respeta.}} ''Chorus:''<br/> {{lang|pap|O, Aruba, dushi tera<br/> nos baranca tan stima<br/> Nos amor p’abo t’asina grandi<br/> cu n’tin nada pa kibr'e, cu'n tin nada pa kibr'e.}} {{lang|pap|Bo playanan tan admira<br/> cu palma tur dorna<br/> Bo escudo y bandera ta<br/> orguyo di nos tur!}} ''Chorus'' {{lang|pap|Grandeza di bo pueblo ta<br/> su gran cordialidad<br/> Cu Dios por guia y conserva<br/> su amor pa libertad!}} ''Chorus'' ===English translation=== Aruba appreciated native land<br/> our venerated cradle<br/> you may be small and simple <br/> but yet you are respected. ''Chorus:'' <br/> Oh Aruba dear country<br/> our rock so beloved<br/> our love for you is so strong<br/> that nothing can destroy it. ''(repeat)'' Your beaches so much admired<br/> with palm trees all adorned<br/> your coat of arms and flag<br/> is the proudness of us all! ''Chorus'' The greatness of our people<br/> is their great cordiality<br/> that God may guide and preserve<br/> his love for liberty! ''Chorus'' ===Spanish translation=== Aruba patria apreciada<br/> nuestra cuna venerada<br/> aunque pequeña y simple<br/> eres respetada. ''Chorus'' Oh Aruba tierra querida<br/> nuestro peñón tan amado<br/> nuestro amor por ti es tan grande<br/> que nada podrá destruirlo. ''(repetir)'' ¡Tus playas tan admiradas<br/> con palmeras todas adornadas<br/> tu escudo y bandera<br/> orgullo de todos nosotros son! ''Chorus'' Grandeza de tu pueblo es<br/> su gran cordialidad<br/> ¡Que Dios guíe y conserve<br/> su amor para la libertad! ''Chorus'' ===Dutch translation=== Aruba gewaardeerd inheems land<br/> Onze vereerde wieg<br/> U kunt klein en eenvoudig zijn<br/> Maar toch gerespecteerd. ''Chorus'' Oh, Aruba, mooi land<br/> Onze rots zo geliefd<br/> Onze liefde voor u is zo sterk<br/> Dat niets het kan vernietigen,<br/> Dat niets het kan vernietigen. Uw stranden zo bewonderd<br/> Alle met palmbomen versierd<br/> Uw wapen en uw vlag<br/> Zijn de trots van iedereen! ''Chorus'' De grootsheid van onze mensen<br/> Is hun geweldige hartelijkheid<br/> Die God kan gidsen en bewaren<br/> Zijn liefde voor vrijheid! ''Chorus'' ==External links== {{Spoken Wikipedia|en-Aruba-Dushi-Tera.ogg|2005-08-18}} *[http://www.national-symbol.com/A/Aruba/Aruba-national-symbol.htm Aruba National Anthems In The World All Countries National Anthems] {{National Anthems of North America}} {{Nationalanthemsofthecaribbeanislands}} [[Category:National symbols of Aruba]] [[Category:National anthems]]
